comment._content: Can't tell if the dog is sitting in the remnants of some old rolltop desk by the name of "PHENIX"

comment.author: 8623220@N02
comment._content: You can have a closer look if you go to a higher resolution version that is available at the persistent URL listed in the description. Click on the thumbnail photo and then open the TIFF file.

comment.author: 72646284@N00
comment._content: That made a difference. In the TIFF the dog looks like he is missing an eye, the upright pencils on the front of the desk, and that there is a wooden-handled umbrella leaning on the fence behind them. It may also be shoelaces hanging in front of the dog.

but altogether - thanks very much for your donations and sharing.
